content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'odw-curated_pinsodwdatadevstorage_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [odw-curated_pinsodwdatadevstorage_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://odw-curated@pinsodwdatadevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE vw (
	[dim_appeal_key] nvarchar(4000),
	[appeal_reference_number] nvarchar(4000),
	[development_or_allegation] nvarchar(4000),
	[appellant] nvarchar(4000),
	[site_address_line_1] nvarchar(4000),
	[site_address_line_2] nvarchar(4000),
	[site_address_postcode] nvarchar(4000),
	[lpa_application_reference] nvarchar(4000),
	[case_measure] nvarchar(4000),
	[redetermined] nvarchar(4000),
	[has_bespoke_target] nvarchar(4000),
	[casework_marker] nvarchar(4000),
	[number_of_residences] nvarchar(4000),
	[link_status] nvarchar(4000),
	[lead_case] nvarchar(4000),
	[is_site_green_belt] nvarchar(4000),
	[enforcement_linked] nvarchar(4000),
	[has_acs_marker] nvarchar(4000),
	[quantity_of_submissions] nvarchar(4000),
	[case_closed_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[appeal_turned_away_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[appeal_withdrawn_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[bespoke_target_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[target_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[first_submission_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[last_submission_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[is_kiosk] nvarchar(4000),
	[in_planning_guarantee] nvarchar(4000),
	[in_measure] nvarchar(4000),
	[was_target_hit] nvarchar(4000),
	[was_legacy_target_hiy] nvarchar(4000),
	[GroundsList] nvarchar(4000),
	[GroundsCount] nvarchar(4000),
	[is_reading_case] nvarchar(4000),
	[horizon_search_url] nvarchar(4000),
	[AreaOfSiteInHectares] nvarchar(4000),
	[FloorSpaceInSquareMetres] nvarchar(4000),
	[InquiryType] nvarchar(4000),
	[AppellantProcedure] nvarchar(4000),
	[AppealsDocumentsComplete] nvarchar(4000),
	[horizon_specialism_list] nvarchar(4000),
	[iss_specialism_list] nvarchar(4000),
	[LeadCaseAppealTypeGroup] nvarchar(4000),
	[DecisionCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[DecisionCodeDesc] nvarchar(4000),
	[Decision_Allowed_Disallowed] nvarchar(4000),
	[CaseWorkReason] nvarchar(4000),
	[Act] nvarchar(4000),
	[Section] nvarchar(4000),
	[appeal_decided_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[source_system] nvarchar(4000),
	[case_stage] nvarchar(4000),
	[SiteVisitTime] nvarchar(4000),
	[Timeline5_StatementOfCommonGroundDue] nvarchar(4000),
	[Timeline5_StatementOfCommonGroundPublished] nvarchar(4000),
	[Timeline5_AppellantStatementPublished] nvarchar(4000),
	[Timeline5_AppellantStatementDue] nvarchar(4000),
	[Ownership_Permission] nvarchar(4000),
	[event_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[lpa_application_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[lpa_decision_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[agricultural_holding] int,
	[development_affect_seeting_of_listed_building] int,
	[historic_building_grant_made] nvarchar(4000),
	[in_ca_relates_to_ca] nvarchar(4000),
	[is_flooding_an_issue] nvarchar(4000),
	[is_the_site_within_an_aonb] nvarchar(4000),
	[is_site_within_an_sssi] nvarchar(4000),
	[date_recovered] nvarchar(4000),
	[callin_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[costs_applied_for_indicator] nvarchar(4000),
	[agent] nvarchar(4000),
	[ons_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[appeal_type_reason_refined] nvarchar(4000),
	[reason_for_the_appeal] nvarchar(4000),
	[site_address] nvarchar(4000),
	[DateNotRecoveredOrDerecovered] nvarchar(4000),
	[standard_priority] nvarchar(4000),
	[is_virtual_event] nvarchar(4000),
	[prior_approval] nvarchar(4000),
	[final_comments_due_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[appeal_source_indicator] nvarchar(4000),
	[ImportantInformation] nvarchar(4000),
	[validity_status_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[validity] nvarchar(4000),
	[lpa_questionnaire_received_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[procedure_lpa] nvarchar(4000),
	[appeal_lapsed_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[appellant_comments_submitted] nvarchar(4000),
	[appellant_comments_forwarded] nvarchar(4000),
	[appellants_proofs_submitted] nvarchar(4000),
	[appellants_proofs_forwarded] nvarchar(4000),
	[appellant_statement_submitted] nvarchar(4000),
	[appellant_statement_forwarded] nvarchar(4000),
	[decision_submit_date] nvarchar(4000),
	[lpa_comments_submitted] nvarchar(4000),
	[lpa_comments_forwarded] nvarchar(4000),
	[lpa_proofs_submitted] nvarchar(4000),
	[lpa_proofs_forwarded] nvarchar(4000),
	[lpa_statement_submitted] nvarchar(4000),
	[lpa_statement_forwarded] nvarchar(4000),
	[proofs_due] nvarchar(4000),
	[statements_due] nvarchar(4000),
	[third_party_reps_forwarded] nvarchar(4000),
	[NationalListStartDate] nvarchar(4000),
	[Horizon_Event_Type] nvarchar(4000),
	[HZN_Inspector] nvarchar(4000),
	[child_cases] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'appeal/vw_AppealDetail/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [odw-curated_pinsodwdatadevstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM appeal.vw
GO
